comments.body: Okay, now I completely got what you're trying to do it. You do want _window functions_ to work without specifying the ordering, and non-window functions already work without specifying ordering (because the results will be deterministic anyway). Yes, -1 for the same comment from @hvanhovell.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +420,424 @@
-- !query
SELECT count(*) OVER (PARTITION BY four) FROM (SELECT * FROM tenk1 WHERE FALSE)s
-- !query schema
struct<count(1) OVER (PARTITION BY four ORDER BY four ASC NULLS FIRST RANGE BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW):bigint>
